paragraphs: Firefighters from the Zlín region of the Czech Republic faced an unusual challenge. They had to rescue a horse that had fallen into the swimming pool of a private house and couldn't get out on its own.
The incident occurred on July 30 in the village of Ostrata (near Zlin). The rescue operation turned out to be difficult and required a lot of effort.
In the end, with the help of special equipment and a crane, the firefighters safely lifted the horse and transferred it to the ground.
The animal was unharmed and was returned to its owner, who was present at the scene and comforting their pet.
